allowUsersToRelateMultipleContactsToTask.title: Allow Users to Relate Multiple Contacts to Tasks and Events
allowUsersToRelateMultipleContactsToTask.description: Although the Metadata API has a ActivitiesSettings.allowUsersToRelateMultipleContactsToTasksAndEvents field, it is not possible to enable this setting using an API. Warning: can only be disabled with help of the salesforce.com Support team. https://developer.salesforce.com/docs/atlas.en-us.api_meta.meta/api_meta/meta_activitiessettings.htm
